languages.text: "Простите... не уберегли мы его. Корабль повредили при бегстве, мы еле дотянули до Футфола. Стоит в дальних доках, но толку с него мало — летать уже, видно, не будет, часть ценного футфольские реколлигеры растащили. Можете послать людей, разобрать оставшееся, компоненты демонтировать".

"Apologies... we couldn't save it. The ship was damaged during the escape — we're lucky it got us all the way to Footfall. It's at the far docks, but there isn't much use for it anymore — it doesn't look like it's going to fly anywhere, and the local recolligers have already removed some of the valuable parts. You can send your people to take apart whatever is left, scavenge some components."
languages.original_text: "Простите... не уберегли мы его. Корабль повредили при бегстве, мы еле дотянули до Футфола. Стоит в дальних доках, но толку с него мало — летать уже, видно, не будет, часть ценного футфольские реколлигеры растащили. Можете послать людей, разобрать оставшееся, компоненты демонтировать".

You can send your people to take apart whatever is left, scavenge some components."

languages.text: 「申し訳ございません…無事に届けることができませんでした。逃走中に損傷を受けてしまい、フットフォールまでたどり着けたのも運が良いくらいです。遠方のドックに停泊していますが、まともには使えないでしょう。どこにも飛べなさそうな上に、地元の回収業者がすでに貴重な部品をいくつか解体してしまいました。部下を派遣して残っているものをすべて分解し、部品をかき集めることならできるかと思います」
languages.original_text: "Apologies... we couldn't save it. The ship was damaged during the escape — we're lucky it got us all the way to Footfall. It's at the far docks, but there isn't much use for it anymore — it doesn't look like it's going to fly anywhere, and the local recolligers have already removed some of the valuable parts. You can send your people to take apart whatever is left, scavenge some components."

traits.locale_text: 「申し訳ございません…無事に届けることができませんでした。逃走中に損傷を受けてしまい、フットフォールまでたどり着けたのも運が良いくらいです。遠方のドックに停泊していますが、まともには使えないでしょう。どこにも飛べなさそうな上に、地元の回収業者がすでに貴重な部品をいくつか解体してしまいました。部下を派遣して残っているものをすべて分解し、部品をかき集めることならできるかと思います」
traits.speaker: Footfall_RefugeeForgeWorld

languages.text: “很抱歉……我们无计可施。那艘船在我们逃亡期间受了损，但我们很幸运，还是乘着它一路逃到了落脚港。它停在远处的码头，但恐怕已经排不上什么用场了。它已经哪里都去不了了，而且当地的回收专员已经搜刮走了一部分有价值的零件。你可以派人把剩下的船体拆开，拿走其中的部件。”
languages.original_text: "Apologies... we couldn't save it. The ship was damaged during the escape — we're lucky it got us all the way to Footfall. It's at the far docks, but there isn't much use for it anymore — it doesn't look like it's going to fly anywhere, and the local recolligers have already removed some of the valuable parts. You can send your people to take apart whatever is left, scavenge some components."

traits.locale_text: “很抱歉……我们无计可施。那艘船在我们逃亡期间受了损，但我们很幸运，还是乘着它一路逃到了落脚港。它停在远处的码头，但恐怕已经排不上什么用场了。它已经哪里都去不了了，而且当地的回收专员已经搜刮走了一部分有价值的零件。你可以派人把剩下的船体拆开，拿走其中的部件。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_RefugeeForgeWorld

languages.text: «Lo sentimos... No hemos podido salvarla. La nave salió herida de la huida; bastante es que fuera capaz de traernos a Paso. Está al final del puerto, pero de poco le va a servir ya: no parece que vaya a volar a ninguna parte y los recolectores de la zona ya se han llevado piezas valiosas. Puede enviar a su tripulación a desmontar lo que quede, así garrapiña algún componente que otro».
languages.original_text: "Apologies... we couldn't save it. The ship was damaged during the escape — we're lucky it got us all the way to Footfall. It's at the far docks, but there isn't much use for it anymore — it doesn't look like it's going to fly anywhere, and the local recolligers have already removed some of the valuable parts. You can send your people to take apart whatever is left, scavenge some components."

traits.locale_text: «Lo sentimos... No hemos podido salvarla. La nave salió herida de la huida; bastante es que fuera capaz de traernos a Paso. Está al final del puerto, pero de poco le va a servir ya: no parece que vaya a volar a ninguna parte y los recolectores de la zona ya se han llevado piezas valiosas. Puede enviar a su tripulación a desmontar lo que quede, así garrapiña algún componente que otro».
traits.speaker: Footfall_RefugeeForgeWorld

languages.text: « Toutes nos excuses... Nous n'avons pas réussi à le sauver. Il avait subi de lourds dégâts dans notre fuite, c'est à peine s'il a pu nous conduire jusqu'à Castel. Vous le trouverez tout au fond des quais, mais vous n'en tirerez pas grand-chose : je crois qu'il ne volera plus jamais, et les récupérateurs du coin ont déjà emporté les pièces les plus précieuses. Enfin, vous pouvez toujours envoyer vos hommes démonter ce qu'il en reste, ils y trouveront bien quelques composants utiles. »
languages.original_text: "Apologies... we couldn't save it. The ship was damaged during the escape — we're lucky it got us all the way to Footfall. It's at the far docks, but there isn't much use for it anymore — it doesn't look like it's going to fly anywhere, and the local recolligers have already removed some of the valuable parts. You can send your people to take apart whatever is left, scavenge some components."

traits.locale_text: « Toutes nos excuses... Nous n'avons pas réussi à le sauver. Il avait subi de lourds dégâts dans notre fuite, c'est à peine s'il a pu nous conduire jusqu'à Castel. Vous le trouverez tout au fond des quais, mais vous n'en tirerez pas grand-chose : je crois qu'il ne volera plus jamais, et les récupérateurs du coin ont déjà emporté les pièces les plus précieuses. Enfin, vous pouvez toujours envoyer vos hommes démonter ce qu'il en reste, ils y trouveront bien quelques composants utiles. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_RefugeeForgeWorld

languages.text: "Verzeiht ... wir konnten es nicht retten. Das Schiff wurde während der Flucht beschädigt – wir hatten Glück, dass es uns bis nach Footfall gebracht hat. Es liegt in den Docks, aber es gibt keine Verwendung mehr dafür – es wird wohl nicht mehr fliegen, und die hiesigen Recolliger haben bereits einige der wertvollen Teile entfernt. Ihr könnt Eure Leute holen lassen, was übrig ist, vielleicht noch einige Komponenten bergen."
languages.original_text: "Apologies... we couldn't save it. The ship was damaged during the escape — we're lucky it got us all the way to Footfall. It's at the far docks, but there isn't much use for it anymore — it doesn't look like it's going to fly anywhere, and the local recolligers have already removed some of the valuable parts. You can send your people to take apart whatever is left, scavenge some components."

traits.locale_text: "Verzeiht ... wir konnten es nicht retten. Das Schiff wurde während der Flucht beschädigt – wir hatten Glück, dass es uns bis nach Footfall gebracht hat. Es liegt in den Docks, aber es gibt keine Verwendung mehr dafür – es wird wohl nicht mehr fliegen, und die hiesigen Recolliger haben bereits einige der wertvollen Teile entfernt. Ihr könnt Eure Leute holen lassen, was übrig ist, vielleicht noch einige Komponenten bergen."
traits.speaker: Footfall_RefugeeForgeWorld

languages.text: "Kusura bakmayın... Onu kurtaramadık. Gemi kaçarken hasar aldı, bizi Binliman'a kadar getirebildiği için şanslıyız. Rıhtımın ücra bir köşesinde duruyor ama artık çalışacak durumda değil. Herhangi bir yere uçabilecekmiş gibi durmuyor, geri dönüşümcüler de bazı değerli parçalarını çoktan aldı bile. Geri kalanları sökmeleri için adamlarınızı gönderebilirsiniz, belki birkaç parçayı kurtarırlar."
languages.original_text: "Apologies... we couldn't save it. The ship was damaged during the escape — we're lucky it got us all the way to Footfall. It's at the far docks, but there isn't much use for it anymore — it doesn't look like it's going to fly anywhere, and the local recolligers have already removed some of the valuable parts. You can send your people to take apart whatever is left, scavenge some components."
